Sorry Gaz, i didnt realise! It goes so quickly :(  Sooo excited about the special though, thanks hunni xxxxxx

Thank you Gary for all the episodes you upload much appreciated and chance of getting any Masterchef UK professional, celebrity or just ordinary really miss it now Im back in Oz and its really hard to get ?

Hi Izzybel. Unfortunately, I will be out of action very soon. I am having an operation which will have me away from my computer from 6 to 8 weeks :(
When I come back, try requesting anything you want on the latest torrent I post, and I will do my best for you :)
Thank you Gary and I hope your operation and recovery go well :-)

Hi Gary, finally i have been able to get into my acount to comment. I want to say a big thankyou for putting all my pommie shows on PB,not sure what i would have done if not for you. I hope your op goes well and that you get back on PB ASAP. I cant wait to see the Towie special :))

Magz my friend, I have no idea what we would all do without you! The op went well, recovering now. I am a little irritable to say the least!!
It is very much appreciated all the well wishes.
i know that you have had your fair share of tough times yourself Magz. Let me just say that I am honoured that you said hello :)
People's, it is because of this lady you get TOWIE!!! And the majority of MIC!!!
God Bless xxxxx
